output_json.summary: Client Negotiation and Mediation skills. Client Relationship building/management derived through experience. Problem identification and Solution Development. Impressive management experience in systemization and regulatory compliance. Excellent oral and written communication skills, interpersonal skills. Strong customer/client focus. Positive attitude. Complex problem solving skills. Compassionate, safety-conscious self-starter.

description: Updated proposals in compliance with CME operational standards.
Developed a working knowledge of the continuing medical education department processes and functions at Advocate South Suburban Hospital.
Helped to coordinate and/or actively participate in various educational programs, meetings, and luncheons for the medical staff.
